about_the_game:
Dark, lonely, sinister, and at times down right disturbing, House of Horror Music Pack from TK.Projects is truly an eerie and unsettling experience. Featuring ominous orchestral themes, dark piano pieces accompanied by haunted ambience, and percussive energy themes for dramatic action, this DLC is sure to find a home in your horror or thriller scenes.

Features:

22 BGM, 10 BGS, 11 ME
.ogg and .m4a formats

Tracklist:

1. HoHM_BGM01_Beginning
2. HoHM_BGM02_Three_Years_Ago
3. HoHM_BGM03_Escape
4. HoHM_BGM04_Night
5. HoHM_BGM05_Horrible
6. HoHM_BGM06_Incubation
7. HoHM_BGM07_Ruins
8. HoHM_BGM08_Insanity
9. HoHM_BGM09_Conflict
10. HoHM_BGM10_Fear
11. HoHM_BGM11_Memories
12. HoHM_BGM12_Ramble_About
13. HoHM_BGM13_End
14. HoHM_BGM14_Disaster
15. HoHM_BGM15_Dada
16. HoHM_BGM16_Enemy
17. HoHM_BGM17_Doubt
18. HoHM_BGM18_Finale
19. HoHM_BGM19_Crisis
20. HoHM_BGM20_Chaos
21. HoHM_BGM21_Trouble
22. HoHM_BGM22_First_Cry

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: Visual Novel Maker - House of Horror Music Vol.1

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Visual Novel Maker - House of Horror Music Vol.1 - $19.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution
